document.full_text: the last three teens in a group charged with bullying a newcomer to their high school who later committed suicide admitted to lesser criminal charges on thursday as part of a plea agreement.
document.title: three more teens guilty of bullying girl who killed herself
lines_and_colors: the last three teens in a group charged with bullying a newcomer to their high school who later committed suicide admitted to lesser criminal charges on thursday as part of a plea agreement.
